title: 英國Alistair Carmichael MP : 我們再也不能忽視香港的人權問題！

replies.msg:
I am calling on the Government to take an active approach by adopting today's Bill. It is time to do what we should have done during the Handover. If we as a country are serious about this new era of “Global Britain”, this is our chance to prove it.

Alistair Carmichael : 我呼籲政府採取積極措施，通過今天的法案。現在是時候做我們在香港主權移交期間應該做的事情了。

如果我們作為一個國家對“全球英國”這個新時代感到認真，那麼這就是一個機會去證明。

I believe that there will be cross-party support and grassroots backing from expat communities to progress this legislation. If the Government intends to give substance to its global rhetoric, it should put its weight behind the Bill as well. #HongKong

我相信，將有跨黨派的支持和移民社區的基層支持，以推動這項立法。如果政府打算實質性地體現其全球言論，它也應將其重心放在法案的後面。


https://www.thetimes.co.uk/edition/comment/we-can-no-longer-ignore-rights-abuses-in-hong-kong-pvs0g2xkt

Via Hong Kong Watch Twitter :

Our patron, @amcarmichaelMP, is today putting down a Bill - sponsored by members of all parties - in the UK Parliament which calls for BNO reform, stronger enforcement of the Joint Declaration, & Magnitsky sanctions.


https://twitter.com/hk_watch/status/1232244444944109568

replies.msg:
MP用Standing Order no. 23提出嘅private bill好難成功 只要政府有心拖嘅話到2046都唔會正式表決到 戰後只差有大約60條bill用呢個方式通過成為法律 對上一次已經差唔多10年前

不過 好多MP目標唔係通過條bill 而係用呢少少發言時間靠直播同傳媒報導將個議題帶入公眾視線

quote.msg: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ten_Minute_Rule

Bills introduced under the Ten Minute Rule rarely progress much further, since the Government usually opposes Private Member's Bills in the later stages and, given their low priority in the schedule

即係無咩機會
即係點
